scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.deploy: npm run prepare-deploy && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.prepare-deploy: npm run build && npm run copy-deps
scripts.copy-deps: cp package.json lib/ && mkdir -p lib/node_modules && cp -r node_modules/firebase-admin node_modules/firebase-functions node_modules/@google-cloud node_modules/cors node_modules/openai lib/node_modules/ && ls -la lib/node_modules && echo 'Vérification des dépendances critiques:' && ls -la lib/node_modules/firebase-admin && ls -la lib/node_modules/firebase-functions
